div.p: Chiral gas chromatogram of the leaf essential oil of Commiphora gileadensis. The major components are indicated: a, (+)-α-thujene; b, (−)-α-thujene; c, (+)-α-pinene; d, (−)-α-pinene; e, (+)-β-pinene; f, (−)-β-pinene; g, (+)-sabinene; h, (−)-sabinene; i, myrcene; j, (+)-limonene; k, α-terpinene; l, (−)-limonene; m, p-cymene; n, terpinolene; o, γ-terpinene; p, (−)-borneol; q, (+)-terpinen-4-ol; r, (−)-terpinen-4-ol; s, (−)-bornyl acetate; t, (−)-α-terpineol; u, (+)-α-terpineol; v, ( E)-caryophyllene; w, germacrene D; x, 1,10-di- epi-cubenol.
